projects.name: DAWebmail
projects.short: An open source Android app to view Zimbra webmails. I spent a good year or so on this project.
videos: <iframe width="300" height="530" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/a5wkmRk7j3w" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen></iframe>

projects.name: Alarm For Snoozers
projects.short: I caught myself setting multiple alarms every night to ensure I wake up in the morning every night. This is for lazy snoozers; uses default alarm clock to set consecutive alarms in an interval.
videos: <iframe width="300" height="530" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/csE6EPvzl58" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen></iframe>

projects.name: Money Keep
videos: <iframe width="300" height="530" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/hFiyEGZZGYU" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen></iframe>

projects.name: Atlas Earth
projects.short: This was the first project I learnt the value of source control in. Developed when I was first learning Android - a geography quizzer.
videos: <iframe width="300" height="530" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/mFFMVsNYvCI" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen></iframe>

projects.name: Drunk Much
projects.short: Do you drunk call your ex? This is for you!
videos: <iframe width="300" height="530" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/fapMDsWYK0c" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen></iframe>

projects.name: Knight's Tour
projects.short: Traverse the entire chess board using a Knight. Was great fun doing the algorithm in CS class, and thought it'd be equally fun to game-ify it.
videos: <iframe width="300" height="530" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/anDKO_ChBeo" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen></iframe>

projects.name: Andro Mouse
projects.short: A gesture controlled mouse and keyboard; use your mobile phone to move your laptop's mouse. I made this during our computer networks course, and our prof later used this throughout the semester as a pointing tool!
videos: <iframe width="530" height="530" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/-Y7GbYjm340" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen></iframe>

projects.name: Sum Race
projects.short: A fun math quiz; similar to what I used to solve in the newspapers as a kid.
videos: <iframe width="300" height="530" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/mrcquzcyDsk" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen></iframe>
